title: Snow Day Singed Bug
body:
Snow day Singed has a sound glitch when backing.
To recreate back with Snow Day Singed.

replies.body: Yo! I actually fixed this like 4 days ago. Should be live next patch along with a whole mess of other skins audio bugs.
Thanks for the report! This is a known issue, but I'd be happy to check on the status of it and bump the bug. :)
